meanings.definition: Able to be identified or known
meanings.sent1: The unique smell of fresh cookies is recognizable from far away.
meanings.sent2: Her voice is so recognizable that I can always tell when she's calling.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat made itself recognizable by leaving a trail of paw prints in the flour.
meanings.sent4: The recognizable sound of the ice cream truck brought joy to the neighborhood children.
meanings.sent5: The recognizable logo on the package assured customers of its quality.

meanings.sent1: The bright red door was recognizable among the other houses on the street.
meanings.sent2: His recognizable laugh echoed through the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The recognizable smell of popcorn wafted through the movie theater, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her recognizable style of painting stood out among the other artists' work.
meanings.sent5: The recognizable landmarks guided us through the unfamiliar city.
